titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4348) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund pending enactment of a multiyear law reauthorizing such programs, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4348) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund pending enactment of a multiyear law reauthorizing such programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-446, by Ms. Foxx.
The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the bill, and provisions in the bill. The resolution waives all points of order against the amendments printed in the report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 125.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 619.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 180 (Roll no. 165).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 177 (Roll no. 166).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4348) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund pending enactment of a multiyear law reauthorizing such programs.
